inn1.comm: off the pads and Sri Lanka are away with a leg-bye
short and wide outside the off stump. Dilshan comes forward and thrashes it through covers for three runs
and the pads are becoming a weapon here as the ball hits him on the pads and trickles to square leg for a leg-bye
off the pads to fine-leg boundary and this time they get four of them- leg-bye's
comes forward and defends to a ball pitching on the middle stump
fuller outside the off stump. Dilshan comes forward and pushes it to cover
outside the off stump and moving away a touch. Tharanga looks to drive and the movement beats the outside edge
good length ball outside the off stump. Tharanga comes forward and defends
fuller on the off stump. Tharanga drives it back to the bowler
fuller on the leg stump. Tharanga flicks it to midwicket to pick up a single
fuller on the off stump. Dilshan comes forward and drives it to mid-on
fuller on the middle and leg. Dilshan pushes it to midwicket with soft hands and runs across for a single
now fetch that! Fuller on the off and middle stump. Dilshan powerfully flicks it over the square-leg, the effect is so powerful that the ball lands on the roof
pulls it to fine-leg for a single
short ball on the middle stump. Tharanga pulls it to deep midwicket  for a superb boundary
good ball there as it pitches on the off stump and swings away. Beats the batsman with the movement
short outside the off stump. Tharanga cuts it to backward point and runs across for a single
on the off stump. Dilshan comes forward and drives it to extra-cover for a single
fuller outside the off stump. Dilshan comes forward and defends it to the off side
outside the off stump. Dilshan cuts it to point
fuller on the off stump. Dilshan comes forward and drives it to mid-off
short outside the off stump. Dilshan comes forward and drives it to point. He wants a single but there is no response from Tharanga
outside the off stump. Dilshan comes forward and drives it straight to point
comes forward and defends
fuller outside the off stump. Tharanga comes forward and drives it to short extra-cover

comes forward and drives it to extra cover
fuller outside the off stump. Dilshan comes forward and drives it to mid-off for a single
drives it to sweeper cover for a single
good length ball on the off stump. Dilshan pushes it to wide mid-on for a single
that's clever by Dilshan! He picks the slower delivery and turns it to fine-leg for a boundary
comes forward and defends it to the off side
short ball on the off stump. Dilshan comes forward and pulls it to deep midwicket for a single
outside the off stump. Tharanga runs it down to third-man for a single

now was that a chance? Dilshan makes room and lofts it to sweeper cover where Bravo runs across and stretches the hand, but does not hold on to the catch. He has the presence of mind to push the ball back into play and save a run for his team

and that's the wicket! Dilshan pays the price for aggression. He tries to cut a ball close to his body and gets a faint edge back to the keeper. Baugh makes no mistakes and takes the catch. Sanga will walk in now
